text.tspan: Collect 20 vp Before type Runs out.
* Reveal Land +1 VP. -- If most west +2VP
* Remove all bandits from an area +2VP
Build a railway where you are

tspan.tspan: As Bandits Attack, but with steps 4 and 5 before 2 and 3
Move 1 space. Most tiles cost One Movement to step onto.
Mountains cost 2, and Water Cannot be stepped on.
- You can play multiple movement jobs together to achieve a
- Land with a Railway on does not cost a Movement point, but
you must activate a movement to use it.
For each group of bandits on the board Roll 1 d6.

text.tspan: On: 1 - Move north , 2 - Move East, 3 - Move south, 4 or 5 - Move West.

tspan.tspan: 6 - Add a bandit to the group
Bandits can move on any type of land (even unrevealed), but if they
would move off the map, add a bandit instead.
Roll as many d12 as indicated by the furthest along
tracker on the board. Then place a bandit counter in each
Battle dice are d6 and count 3,4,5 as 1 hit/save, and 6 as 2 hits/saves
For each group of bandits on the same tile as any players:
1) Players may activate as many defence or attack jobs as they like.
2) Bandits roll 1 dice per bandit, players roll 1 dice per Defence together.
3) For every Hit above Saves, all players take 1 Pain (P) Card
4) Players counter by rolling Attack, and Bandits rolling per bandit
5) For every hit above Saves remove 1 bandit
